alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Goochland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:59PM EDT until September 08 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CUMBERLAND...NORTHWESTERN GOOCHLAND AND FLUVANNA COUNTIES... At 859 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Schuyler to Duncan, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Fork Union and Columbia around 905 PM EDT. Palmyra around 910 PM EDT. Lake Monticello around 915 PM EDT. Kents Store around 920 PM EDT. Troy around 925 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Dixie, Nahor, Stage Junction, Shores, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Antioch, Union Mills, and Caledonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
